bluebird: https://github.com/petkaantonov/bluebird/releases
foundation: https://github.com/zurb/foundation/releases, https://github.com/zurb/bower-foundation/releases (for vendor .js)
jquery: https://jquery.com/download/
moment: https://github.com/moment/moment/releases
pubsub: https://github.com/mroderick/PubSubJS/tags
querystring: https://github.com/sindresorhus/query-string/releases
require: http://requirejs.org/docs/download.html
slick: https://github.com/kenwheeler/slick/releases
underscore: https://github.com/jashkenas/underscore/releases
waypoints: https://github.com/imakewebthings/waypoints/releases
webshim: https://github.com/aFarkas/webshim/releases
